headline: What Prologis (PLD)'s Dividend Hike, Leadership Shift and Data Center Push Mean For Shareholders
summary: Prologis recently declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of US$1.01 per common share and a US$1.0675 dividend on its 8.54% Series Q Cumulative Redeemable Preferred Stock, both payable on December 31, 2025, while also announcing that long-time executive Damon Austin will become Chief Development Officer on January 1, 2026. Behind these routine corporate actions, Prologis is reporting record leasing activity, raising core FFO guidance, and expanding a fast-growing data center development...
